vocabulary.definition: to make something appear less important than it really is
vocabulary.example: The media underplayed the significance of the discovery, overshadowing its impact.
Living in a remote village, she often felt isolated from the bustling city life.
The helicoidal structure of DNA was a groundbreaking discovery in science.

vocabulary.definition: occurring after the death of the originator
vocabulary.example: The author's final book was published posthumously, receiving great acclaim.

vocabulary.definition: to change something radically or fundamentally
vocabulary.example: The invention of the internet revolutionized the way people communicate globally.
